post:
TheStack : was founded in 2015, we strive to make ourselves a top-leading web hosting service provider. The services we provide range from shared hosting, reseller hosting, email hosting, VPS hosting, dedicated servers and colocation, plus we also provide server management and DevOps consultations.

TheStack has stepped into its 6th year since established, without the support from the public, we wouldn't be better than today. So we would like to run this promotion as a gratitude


### VPS Offers
Plan 1 - ROOKIE
- 512MB RAM
- 1x vCPU
- 20GB Disk Space
- 1TB transfer
- 1Gbps uplink
- 1x IPv4
- KVM Virtualization / Customized Control Panel
- Coupon Code: ROOKIEYEAREND
- $25/year
- Order link (https://portal.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=128&billingcycle=annually&promocode=ROOKIEYEAREND)

Plan 2 - SOPHOMORE
- 1024MB RAM
- 2x vCPU
- 30GB Disk Space
- 2TB transfer
- 1Gbps uplink
- 1x IPv4
- KVM Virtualization / Customized Control Panel
- Coupon Code: SOPHOMOREYEAREND
- $35/year
- Order link (https://portal.thestack.net/cart.php?=add&pid=129&billingcycle=annually&promocode=SOPHOMOREYEAREND)

Plan 3 - VETERAN
- 2048MB RAM
- 4x vCPU
- 50GB Disk Space
- 3TB transfer
- 1Gbps uplink
- 1x IPv4
- KVM Virtualization / Customized Control Panel
- Coupon Code: VETERANYEAREND
- $45/year
- Order link (https://portal.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=130&billingcycle=annually&promocode=VETERANYEAREND)

Plan 4 - MASTER
- 4096MB RAM
- 4x vCPU
- 80GB Disk Space
- 5TB transfer
- 1Gbps uplink
- 1x IPv4
- KVM Virtualization / Customized Control Panel
- Coupon Code: MASTERYEAREND
- $55/year
- Order link (https://portal.thestack.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=127&billingcycle=annually&promocode=MASTERYEAREND)


We utilize Dual Intel E5 CPUs and RAID 10 arrays on all of our VPS nodes, and we never oversell, we provide a 99.9% uptime guarantee on all VPS plans. We've setup proactive monitoring for all of our nodes, should you have any server or network issues, you can reach out to our in-house support team anytime via helpdesk, email or live chat, you should always get a response within 20 minutes.

We've developed a new modern website in English and Simplified Chinese. We are interested in providing sponsorship to open-source projects and COVID-19 related projects, if you are looking for sponsorship, feel free to contact us.



Shared | Reseller | Dedicated | Colocation
Addons : Email hosting | Server management | DevOps consultations.
